content: While there may not be a cooking robot available yet, there are many kitchen appliances that can help make cooking easier and quicker. For example, slow cookers, pressure cookers, and air fryers are all kitchen appliances that can make cooking delicious meals much simpler. Additionally, there are meal delivery services that can provide pre-prepared meals that you can simply heat up and enjoy. While these options may not exactly be a shortcut to becoming a great cook, they can make meal preparation easier and can help free up time to pursue other interests.
